# Air-Emissions-CO2-2021
Public Data Set on U.S. Air Emissions 2021
This repository contains air emissions data on three different pollutants in cities spanning across the U.S., each identifiable by coordinates.

## Contents and Source
This repository contains a [python notebook](https://colab.research.google.com/drive/19nRtESeYKHnMA1BsNxz3ZfUG7JHk4sqv?usp=drive_link), which details how to create a subset from a `.csv` file from this [raw public dataset](https://uncch.instructure.com/courses/76129/files/9943185?wrap=1&instfs_id=35cd1a1b-f7d7-470f-85a9-fd2758d2e75e&verifier=xyRToTDpaRVx32AYa6cW8ZthhVLBiaYSxG3Vqmcm&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiIsImtpZCI6Im5ldy1xdWl6emVzL2NhbnZhc19maWxlX2F1dGhvcml6YXRpb24ifQ.eyJyZXNvdXJjZSI6Ii9jb3Vyc2VzLzc2MTI5L2ZpbGVzLzk5NDMxODU_.bBZlDv0tYx2DhH9pGFgzeVw0lnXa1SA4gEDhvgNq1vVqZBykBsfrUVhAZCQrOM65xf-ST1mfrHuXWJKjEJQd2Q).
- Besides the materials provided, it will be necessary to have access to [Google Colabs](https://colab.research.google.com/) and [Google Drive](https://drive.google.com/drive/my-drive).
## What is the purpose of this repository?
- The purpose of this repository is to pinpoint CO2 emissions in the U.S. in 2021.
- This data is useful for climate scientists or individuals interested in air emissions in recent years.
- An analysis of CO2 records based on location can be helpful to identify factors contirbuting to emissions.

## Where is this data from?
This data is from [The United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA)](https://www.epa.gov/ghgreporting). It was recorded through their Greenhouse Gas Reporting Program (GHGRP), which requires information from large GHG emission sources. Annually, they receive data from about 8,000 facilities, which they combine into raw datatsets that are publicized every October. 

## What purposes can this data serve?
- This data could be used by climate scientists to track the largest emittors of CO2 and ensure they are aligning with regulations.
- This data could be studied to find national or regional carbon footprints.
